description:
In Viviter's multiplayer mode, where you can play "Chickempic" with up to 8 players, we're adding the "Matrlympics" mini-game!
And so it begins, the Matrlympics!
In this competition, contestants compete to narrowly dodge bullets fired directly at them.
Now! As the referee signals, the bullet has been fired!
Ohh, what a dodge! Could this be the work of a the one?!
name: Additional mini-game "Matrlympics"
